channel.title: P ring help
channel.description: How do i make it so the perfect ring puts up stats by 10k

item.title: P ring help
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

nvm i figured it out i just put a bonus on a bunch of items now when i type ::ownerlook and put on all the items my bonuses go up to 1million

Read full topic

item.title: P ring help
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

[quote=“Steph., post:6, topic:143364”][quote author=lostandfound link=topic=196652.msg1757168#msg1757168 date=1189835936]

is there anyway i an make another ring do the same stuff as a p ring

Its possible but it would take some time
because you have unpack cache in client
then add a ring then pack

then add bonus to the rings in item.cfg
[/quote]

Its only in item.cfg…

Idk what you are going on about with packing and unpacking CLIENT side…

bonuses are server side…[/quote]
Well you could do with another ring but i thought he wanted to add a new ring

Read full topic

item.title: P ring help
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

open up item.cfg

then look for

item = 773	'perfect'_ring

then switch it with this

item = 773	'perfect'_ring	A_perfect_ruby_ring.	1469.99280576915	1469.99280576915	1760.58823743125	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000

Read full topic
